any_tags.description: List ports which have any given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)

device_owner.description: List only ports with the specified device owner. This is the entity that uses the port (for example, network:dhcp).

fixed_ip.description: Desired IP and/or subnet for filtering ports (name or ID): subnet=<subnet>,ip-address=<ip-address> (repeat option to set multiple fixed IP addresses)

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: csv, json, table, value, yaml)

mac_address.description: List only ports with this MAC address

network.description: List only ports connected to this network (name or ID)

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

not_any_tags.description: Exclude ports which have any given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)

not_tags.description: Exclude ports which have all given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)

project.description: List ports according to their project (name or ID)

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

router.description: List only ports attached to this router (name or ID)

server.description: List only ports attached to this server (name or ID)

tags.description: List ports which have all given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)
